title: What is E4 position in a PSU? - Quora

response.answer_text: E4-Executive Level Four. It’s generally a middle management post in a PSU depending on particular companies organisational structure. Generally there may be Executive grades varying from E0 to E8 or E9 bearing various designation names depending on organisation. I can enlist the same in my organisation as: E0-Graduate Engineer Trainee E1-Junior Manager E2-Assistant Manager E3-Deputy Manager E4-Manager E5-Senior Manager E6-Assistant General Manager E7-Deputy General Manager E8-General Manager E9-Executive Director Beyond that that there is directorate and a CMD, which is under the purview of Ministry directly and recruitment for these is directly held by PESB (Public Enterprise Selection Board). Best of luck for your future endeavours!
